quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth. – Henry David Thoreau
fact: The name for Oz in the "Wizard of Oz" was thought up when the creator, Frank Baum, looked at his filing cabinet and saw A-N, and O-Z; hence the name "OZ."
joke: A doll was recently found dead in a rice paddy. It's the only known instance of a nick nack paddy wack.
